Performance:
January 1978: The Battle of Coxinga

Production: January 1978

Play: The Battle of Coxinga (国性爺合戦)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

On the Hirado Beach (平戸浜伝ひ / Hirado hamatsutai)

The Tiger Hunt (千里が竹虎狩り / Senrigatake toragari)

The Castle Gate (楼門 / Rōmon)

Kanki's Mansion (See also The Shishigajo Catsle) (甘輝館 (See also 獅子が城) / Kanki yakata (See also Shishigajō))

The Red Signal (See also The Shishigajo Catsle) (紅流し (See also 獅子が城) / Beninagashi (See also Shishigajō))

The Chinese Ship (唐土船 / Morokoshi bune)

The Shishigajo Catsle (See also Kanki's Mansion and The Red Signal) (獅子が城 (See also 甘輝館 and 紅流し) / Shishigajō (See also Kanki yakata and Beninagashi))

Characters:

Emperor Shisoretsu (Daimin Kōtei / 大明皇帝)

Ri Toten (Ugunshō Ri Tōten / 右軍将李蹈天)

Prince Bairoku (Shisha Bairokuō / 使者梅勒王)

Go Sankei (Shiba shōgun Gosankei / 司馬将軍呉三桂)

Princess Sendan (Sendan Kōjo / 栴檀皇女)

Ryukakun (Ryūkakun / 柳哥君)

An Taijin (An Taijin / 安大人)

Watonai (Watōnai / 和藤内)

Komutsu (Nyōbō Komutsu / 女房小むつ)

Ro Ikkan (Teishiryū Rō Ikkan / 鄭芝龍老一官)

Ro Ikkan's wife (Rō Ikkan tsuma / 老一官妻)

Kinshojo (Kinshōjo / 錦祥女)

Gojogun Kanki (Gojōgun Kanki / 五常軍甘輝)

Ladies-in-waiting (Koshimoto / 腰元)

Court ladies (Nyokan / 女官)

Beaters (Seko / 勢子)

Watonai's mother (Watōnai haha / 和藤内母)

Retainers (Gunpyō / 軍兵)
